<<<<<<< HEAD
A visitation in love to those of the people called Baptists, with whom the Lords Spirit yet ceaseth not to strive, that have not slain the witness by making war, and contending against the light ... by one who travels in the Spirit for their souls good ... J.A. Anderdon, John, 1624?-1685.
[2], 13 p.
Printed for Robert Wilson ..., London : 1660.
Signed at end: John Anderdon. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

[2], 13 p.
Printed for Robert Wilson ..., London : 1660.
Signed at end: John Anderdon. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
